mapper.select: SELECT USERCODE, USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, GRADE, ADDR, EMAIL, TO_CHAR( JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) AS JOINDATE, POINT, NICKNAME FROM MEMBER ORDER BY USERCODE DESC
SELECT USERCODE, USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, GRADE, ADDR, EMAIL, TO_CHAR( JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) AS JOINDATE, POINT, NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USERCODE = #{ usercode }
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWD = #{ passwd }, USERNAME = #{ username }, BIRTHDAY = #{ birthday }, GENDER = #{ gender }, GRADE = #{ grade }, ADDR = #{ addr }, EMAIL = #{ email }, POINT = #{ point } WHERE USERCODE = #{ usercode }
